description: Defines a Note class for local persistence and UI rendering, including properties, copyWith, mapping, and formatting methods.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note entity with properties for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with methods for copying, mapping, and formatting.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with modified fields.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note object into a Map for serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Note instance from a Map.

methods.name: formattedUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the formatted string of the updatedAt timestamp.
